Russia-appointed official says Ukraine shells bakery in occupied eastern UkraineLeonid Pasechnik, put in charge of Ukraine's Russia-controlled eastern Luhansk region by Moscow, said two people were taken to hospital and more may be under the rubble after a Ukrainian attack hit a bakery in the city of Lysychansk on Saturday. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 16:21:57 GMT FW5O4I47HFNJBHF2K7GWVU2QRY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-appointed-official-says-ukraine-shells-bakery-occupied-eastern-ukraine-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Turkey completes new homes in area hit by devastating earthquakeTurkey on Saturday handed over keys to newly-completed homes to some of those left homeless after last year's devastating earthquake, one year after the country's deadliest disaster in its modern history. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 15:28:43 GMT 2CYKGB3FZVONZO6XCVMS3LJ754 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-completes-new-homes-area-hit-by-devastating-earthquake-2024-02-03/Reuters世界中东
Around 200,000 gather across Germany in latest protests against far-rightAround 200,000 people took to the streets in Germany on Saturday, most of them in the capital Berlin, as nationwide protests against the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) party entered their fourth week. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 14:01:38 GMT OUBSYM4PBBOERJYOMP4NQR6PWM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/least-120000-gather-berlin-latest-round-protests-against-far-right-2024-02-03/Andreas Rinke, Christoph Steitz世界欧洲
Dozens detained in Moscow at rally of Russian soldiers' wives, rights group saysDozens of people were detained by police in central Moscow on Saturday at a rally protesting against Russia's mobilisation of men to fight in Ukraine, a human rights group said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 13:40:34 GMT JENHLKNI7JPPPOKWEZXTGXW7EU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dozens-detained-moscow-rally- Russian-soldiers-wives-rights-group-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Vittorio Emanuele of Savoy, son of Italy's last king, dies aged 86Vittorio Emanuele of Savoy, the only son of Italy's last king, who lived in exile in neighbouring Switzerland for most of his life, has died aged 86 at his home in Geneva, a note by the Royal House of Savoy said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 13:06:54 GMT SEW3A4YNKNPQZFQYBLTFNXCVGU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/obituary-vittorio-emanuele-savoy-son-italys-last-king-dies-ged-86-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
U.S. launches strikes in Iraq, Syria, nearly 40 reported killedThe strikes, which included the use of long-range B-1 bombers flown from the United States, were the first in a U.S. response to an attack in Jordan last weekend by Iran-backed militants that killed three U.S. troops. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:48:14 GMT 4ETDYVPK2FPAHKV7G5NZ6YE6CI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-launches-retaliatory-strikes-iraq-syria-nearly-40-reported-killed-2024-02-03/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Timour Azhari世界
India to replace troops in Maldives with civilians by MayIndia will remove its troops in the Maldives by May, the Maldivian Foreign Ministry said on Saturday, as the two countries seek agreement on a pullout that has strained ties. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:40:01 GMT ONKQWJCEP5MKTC4OVTZLHLKVCY https://www.reuters.com/world/india-replace-troops-maldives-with-civilians-by-may-2024-02-03/Krishn Kaushik, Mohamed Junayd世界
Ukraine hits Russia's Volgograd oil refinery in latest drone attack, source saysThe drones struck the largest oil refinery in southern Russia, the latest in a series of long-range attacks on Russian oil facilities. Lukoil, which owns the refinery, said the plant was working as normal. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:35:57 GMT RZRFOJIIKZLAHDI6J2GAZARFZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-sbu-hits-Russias-volgograd-oil-refinery-drone-attack-source-2024-02-03/Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Senegalese President Sall postpones presidential votePresident Macky Sall on Saturday postponed Senegal's planned Feb. 25 presidential election, announcing in a televised address to the nation that he had cancelled the relevant electoral law due to electoral disputes he warned could fuel unrest. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:32:58 GMT 5AB5KVYOXRKVTP3PXS4SB24C2U https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/some-senegalese-opposition-reject-bid-delay-presidential-vote-2024-02-03/Diadie Ba, Ngouda Dione世界非洲
Imran Khan and his wife get seven-year prison sentence for unlawful marriageFormer Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife Bushra Khan were sentenced to seven years in prison and fined on Saturday by a court that ruled their 2018 marriage broke the law, his party said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 10:55:09 GMT ZEGJDPCT4BMZHEFOH4B5YJ74C4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-ex-pm-imran-khan-wife-get-7-years-unlawful-marriage-ary-news-2024-02-03/Gibran Peshimam, Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
Israel pressures Gaza cities, health officials say 18 die in airstrikesIsraeli airstrikes killed 18 Palestinians in the Gaza cities of Rafah and Deir Al-Balah, Gaza health officials said on Saturday, as residents of the enclave feared Israel would expand its ground offensive into those last remaining areas where people have sought shelter. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 10:47:56 GMT 26AL3INDM5OIJNXHP3NB3DON44 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-keeps-Pressure-last-two-refugee-cities-kills-18-health-officials-2024-02-03/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
